title: What is information technology's role today? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a big role of Information Technology in today's world. It is impacting each and every sector. Everything now changed with the advancement in technology. For example, if we talk about the Indian education sector, modern technologies are transforming the way of education and making it more effective and easy for students as well as teachers. The digital transformation in education allows educators and students to connect through mobile apps, sending notifications of classes/ lectures, allowing them to manage the classroom, attendance, exam and results and everything that a teacher wants to automate. And this all become possible by a single IT solution i.e. Education ERP. ERP is a bulk of software system that automates every single process within the institutions to make teaching more effective and reducing academic operations cost. It also increases the ROI for the institutions and gets the education system to the next level.
